name: playwright_selectors_actions
description: Advanced element selection with Playwright locators and actions

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const heading = await page.locator('h1').textContent(); console.log('Found:', heading); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Found: Example Domain

Element located and text extracted

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://google.com'); await page.getByRole('textbox', {name: /search/i}).fill('Playwright automation'); await page.keyboard.press('Enter'); await page.waitForLoadState('networkidle'); console.log('Search performed'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Search performed

Role-based selector with fill action

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const links = await page.getByRole('link').all(); console.log(`Found ${links.length} links`); for (const link of links) { console.log('  -', await link.textContent()); } await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Found 1 links
  - More information...

Multiple elements iterated
